divs: sighting detailsi wanted to wait until another vermonter reported what i saw in wocester, vt. on the evening of the 24th.....i saw the same thing. a round ball of very bright light headed due north. this was a bit after 9 o'clock. i remember initially thinking it was a shooting star but there was cloud cover. i had commented to my girlfriend that i couldn't see any stars because of it. although it was moving fast, it wasn't as fast as a shooting star.....and it was below the clouds. what was very strange for me was, after watching it cover about 3\4 of the sky-----out go the lights. nothing. like someone flicked the switch. i am retired law enforcement....30 yrs. this, just like it was for the woman who wrote earlier....was exciting to see.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Montpelier
There were no other sightings in Montpelier on or around September 24th 2010
